title: Contagion v2.0.9.4 SteamRiP-CS
description:
Contagion v2.0.9.4 SteamRiP-CS


How to install

1- Open Contagion_v2.0.9.4_SteamRiP-CS.7z.001 and then extract all the files.
2- Copy all the files and folders from RevEmu release_24052015 folder on the Crack folder to the Contagion main folder(where the game executable is).
3- Copy rev.ini configuration file from the Rev folder(open it and edit your nickname if you want) and paste on the Contagion main folder.
4- Run Revloader.exe.
5- Play the game.

If you like the game, please buy it.

Steamrip by Christsnatcher
